element.name: rpbody
element.sql: SELECT sa.log_date, s.name staff, s1.name src, CONCAT_WS('', s1.code, o.src_id) ordNum, pg.id gpid, bt.name booktype, bp.name bookpart, av.value paper, pg.width, pg.height, pg.prints, sat.name satype, sa.remark FROM staff_activity sa INNER JOIN staff s ON s.id=sa.staff INNER JOIN staff_activity_type sat ON sa.sa_type = sat.id INNER JOIN orders o ON sa.order_id = o.id INNER JOIN sources s1 ON o.source=s1.id INNER JOIN print_group pg ON sa.pg_id =pg.id INNER JOIN book_part bp ON bp.id = pg.book_part INNER JOIN book_type bt ON bt.id = pg.book_type INNER JOIN attr_value av ON av.id = pg.paper WHERE sa.log_date BETWEEN :pfrom AND DATE_ADD( :pto , INTERVAL 1 DAY)
